mapper.select: SELECT * FROM DSCSN_TTL ORDER BY DSCSN_TTL_SN
SELECT DSCSN_TTL_SN FROM DSCSN_TTL WHERE DSCSN_TTL_SN = #{itemID}

SELECT c.COUNSELOR_TYPE AS TYPE, c.CNSLR_NM AS counselor, c.CNSL_SN AS counselorId, c.ARSP_NM AS ITEM, t.TIMETBL AS consultationTime, s.DSCSN_DT_YMD AS consultationDate, s.DSCSN_REG_YMD AS creationDate, s.cnsl_schedule_sn AS scheduleId FROM CNSL_SCHEDULE s JOIN COUNSELOR c ON s.CNSL_SN = c.CNSL_SN JOIN TIMETBL t ON s.TIMETBL_CD = t.TIMETBL_CD ORDER BY s.DSCSN_DT_YMD, t.TIMETBL_CD

SELECT c.COUNSELOR_TYPE AS TYPE, c.CNSLR_NM AS counselor, c.CNSL_SN AS counselorId, c.ARSP_NM AS ITEM, t.TIMETBL AS consultationTime, s.DSCSN_DT_YMD AS consultationDate, s.DSCSN_REG_YMD AS creationDate, d.DSCSN_TTL_SN as itemId, s.cnsl_schedule_sn as scheduleId, (SELECT COUNT(dr.cnsl_schedule_sn) FROM dscsn_rsvt dr WHERE dr.cnsl_schedule_sn = s.cnsl_schedule_sn) AS count FROM CNSL_SCHEDULE s JOIN COUNSELOR c ON s.CNSL_SN = c.CNSL_SN JOIN DSCSN_TTL d ON d.DSCSN_TTL = c.ARSP_NM JOIN TIMETBL t ON s.TIMETBL_CD = t.TIMETBL_CD WHERE s.cnsl_sn = #{checkId} and s.dscsn_yn = 'N'
SELECT c.CNSL_SN FROM COUNSELOR c JOIN USER_INFO u ON c.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE u.LOGIN_ID= #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CNSL_SCHEDULE WHERE CNSL_SN = #{id} AND TIMETBL_CD = #{cdNum} AND DSCSN_DT_YMD = #{strDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CNSL_SCHEDULE (CNSL_SCHEDULE_SN, CNSL_SN, TIMETBL_CD, DSCSN_DT_YMD, DSCSN_REG_YMD, DSCSN_YN) VALUES (schedule_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{cdNum}, #{strDate}, SYSDATE,'N')
mapper.select: SELECT a.dscsn_rsvt_sn, B.stdnt_sn, B.stdnt_nm, a.dscsn_rsvt_ymd, c.dscsn_dt_ymd, d.timetbl FROM DSCSN_RSVT A JOIN STDNT B ON a.stdnt_sn = B.stdnt_sn JOIN CNSL_SCHEDULE C ON a.cnsl_schedule_sn = c.cnsl_schedule_sn JOIN TIMETBL D ON c.timetbl_cd = d.timetbl_cd WHERE a.cnsl_schedule_sn = #{scheduleId}
mapper.update: UPDATE CNSL_SCHEDULE SET DSCSN_YN = 'Y' WHERE CNSL_SCHEDULE_SN = #{scheduleId}
UPDATE DSCSN_RSVT SET DSCSN_YN = 'Y' WHERE DSCSN_RSVT_SN = #{processingId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.cnslr_nm, c.stdnt_nm, d.dscsn_dt_ymd, e.timetbl, f.dscsn_ttl, a.dscsn_rsvt_sn FROM DSCSN_RSVT A JOIN COUNSELOR B ON a.cnsl_sn = b.cnsl_sn JOIN STDNT C ON a.stdnt_sn = c.stdnt_sn JOIN cnsl_schedule D ON a.cnsl_schedule_sn = d.cnsl_schedule_sn JOIN timetbl E ON d.timetbl_cd = e.timetbl_cd JOIN DSCSN_TTL F ON a.dscsn_ttl_sn = f.dscsn_ttl_sn WHERE a.cnsl_sn = #{checkId} AND a.dscsn_yn = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM DSCSN_RSLT_CN WHERE DSCSN_RSLT_CN.DSCSN_RSVT_SN = A.DSCSN_RSVT_SN )

SELECT C.COUNSELOR_TYPE, C.CNSLR_NM, D.DSCSN_TTL, B.DSCSN_DT_YMD, E.STDNT_NM, F.PRCS_RSLT_CN, F.RSLT_REG_YMD, G.TIMETBL FROM DSCSN_RSVT A JOIN CNSL_SCHEDULE B ON A.CNSL_SCHEDULE_SN = B.CNSL_SCHEDULE_SN JOIN COUNSELOR C ON B.CNSL_SN = C.CNSL_SN JOIN DSCSN_TTL D ON A.DSCSN_TTL_SN = D.DSCSN_TTL_SN JOIN STDNT E ON A.STDNT_SN = E.STDNT_SN JOIN DSCSN_RSLT_CN F ON A.DSCSN_RSVT_SN = F.DSCSN_RSVT_SN JOIN TIMETBL G ON B.TIMETBL_CD = G.TIMETBL_CD
SELECT * FROM COUNSELOR ORDER BY CNSL_SN
